original_content:
Join us on Wednesday, September 20 at noon Pacific for the Satellite Hunting Hack Chat with Scott Tilley!
From the very first beeps of Sputnik, space has primarily been the domain of nations. It makes sense  for the most part, it takes the resources of a nation to get anything of appreciable size up out of the gravity well we all live in, but more importantly, space is the highest of high ground, and the high ground has always been a place of advantage to occupy. And so a lot of the hardware weve sent upstairs in the last 70 years has been in the national interest of this or that country.
A lot of these satellites are  or were, at least  top secret stuff, with classified payloads, poorly characterized orbits, and unknown communications protocols. This can make tracking them from the ground a challenge, but one thats worth undertaking. Scott Tilley has been hunting for satellites for years, writing about his exploits on the Riddles in the Sky blog and sometimes being featured on Hackaday. After recently putting his skills to work listening in on a solar observation satellite as its orbit takes it close to Earth again, we asked him to stop by the Hack Chat to share what hes learned about hunting for satellites, both long-lost and intentionally hidden. Join us as we take a virtual trip into orbit to find out just whats going on up there.
Our Hack Chats are live community events in the Hackaday.io Hack Chat group messaging. This week we’ll be sitting down on Wednesday, September 20 at 12:00 PM Pacific time. If time zones have you tied up, we have a handy time zone converter.
title: 9月20日（水曜日）正午にスコット・ティリーと一緒に行う、衛星追跡のハックチャットに参加しよう！
body: 9月20日(水)の正午、Scott TilleyとのSatellite Hunting Hack Chatに参加しませんか？宇宙は主に国家の領域であり、追跡は挑戦ですが、価値があります。Scottは長年に渡り衛星の狩猟を行っており、このHack Chatで彼の知識を共有します。生コミュニティイベントで、タイムゾーンはこちらで調整可能です。
titles: 9月20日（水曜日）正午にスコット・ティリーと一緒に行う、衛星追跡のハックチャットに参加しよう！
スコット・ティリーと一緒に行う、隠された衛星の追跡に関するハックチャットに参加しよう！
スコット・ティリーが教える、長らく忘れられた衛星の追跡についてのハックチャットに参加しよう！
バーチャルな旅で衛星の行動を知ろう！スコット・ティリーと一緒に追跡のハックチャットに参加しよう！
世界中のコミュニティが集まるハックチャットで、衛星追跡について学びましょう！
